content:
jason Blasco  Staff writerJanuary  

The Eastern mens and womens swim teams second to last meet of the season will be of great importance PERIOD



The Panthers men are coming off a  victory against Millikin and the Eastern women will look to ride the momentum from their  victory PERIOD

I didnt really see the difference in their time Yanney said PERIOD Where I saw more of a difference was in the effort the team is giving. eastern was able to take full advantage of Millikins youth and lack of depth by experimenting with its swimmers in different positions and distances PERIOD However going into the meet against Valparaiso the Panthers wont have the same luxury PERIOD

According to Yanney Valpo breastroker Mike Hermes and Sean Conrin will be the swimmers that will create a challenge strategically PERIOD

On the womens side Yanney anticipates distance swimmer Britt Nelson in the  meter and  meter and butterfly swimmer Katie Urbas to cause problems for the womens team PERIOD

We swam against Valpo earlier in the year and traditionally they are a secondhalf team and I anticipate they are going to be more prepared Yanney said PERIOD It is definitely not going be like the Millikin meet PERIOD Everyone is going to be swimming in their strong events this week. easterns meet against the Crusaders takes on increased importance because it hopes to have the momentum factor with the Midwest Classic in Indianapolis less then a month away PERIOD

This is definitely important for us to perform well in this upcoming meet and the meet against St PERIOD Louis Yanney said PERIOD

The results of the Eastern mens and womens trip to Millikin was definitely a momentum builder for the teams PERIOD

The teams combined to win a total of  individual swimming events at Millikin on Jan  PERIOD

Eastern swimmer Jordan Sherbrooke finished the  meter freestyle with a time of two minutes and Tom Watson won the  free with a time of . and the  free with a time of . pERIOD Paul Yemm finished with a time of . in the mens  butterfly and also finished second in the  Individual medley PERIOD Claire Garvey also won the  IM with a time of . and the  freestyle at . pERIOD Josh Kercheval also won the  IM with a time of . and  yard backstroke with a time of . pERIOD

It is just a matter seeing what kind of effort that we can get out of them Yanney said PERIOD Conference isnt won by yourself its won by coming together and supporting everybody else. sports
